greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Write the terms of A102370 in base 2, read by upward-sloping diagonals and convert to base 10.
comment: Read the central column of Table 1 of the paper, s(n), by upward-sloping diagonals. - _R. J. Mathar_, Aug 10 2007
link: David Applegate, Benoit Cloitre, Philippe Deléham and N. J. A. Sloane, Sloping binary numbers: a new sequence related to the binary numbers [pdf, ps].
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Apr 29 2005
ext: Corrected and extended by _R. J. Mathar_, Aug 10 2007
